comment.text: Involved in the transduction of mitogenic signals from the cell membrane to the nucleus. May also regulate the TOR signaling cascade.
Isoform 2: Serves as a positive regulator of myogenic differentiation by inducing cell cycle arrest, the expression of myogenin and other muscle-specific proteins, and myotube formation.
ATP + a protein = ADP + a phosphoprotein.

isoform.name: DA-Raf1
isoform.text: Has a wider tissue distribution than isoform 1, and acts as dominant-negative antagonist.

comment.text: Belongs to the protein kinase superfamily. TKL Ser/Thr protein kinase family. RAF subfamily.

property.value: Signaling by moderate kinase activity BRAF mutants
Signaling by high-kinase activity BRAF mutants
Signaling by BRAF and RAF fusions
Paradoxical activation of RAF signaling by kinase inactive BRAF
P:positive regulation of ERK1 and ERK2 cascade
P:regulation of proteasomal ubiquitin-dependent protein catabolic process

feature.description: In a colorectal adenocarcinoma sample; somatic mutation.
